comment:
Linear Programming (LP):A mathematical method used to determine the best outcome in a given mathematical model, subject to linear constraints.
Objective Function:In a linear programming problem, the function that needs to be minimized or maximized, such as the total wage bill in this case.
Constraints:Restrictions or limitations that must be satisfied in a linear programming problem, such as the requirement to keep the weekly wage bill below $30000 and have at least 10 young adults working each day.
